entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:08 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
